'''The Demon''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

The Demon is hired muscle for [The King's Coffin](/theKingsCoffin/). She offers little conversation, besides to warn you she'll break your legs if you touch the courtesans without their permission.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = x
|other           =
}}

##  Trivia 

* This character was created as part of the ["Create an Inn"](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireBackerCreatedContentBuildAnInn/) fig backer reward.<ref>https://forums.obsidian.net/topic/109773-kings-coffin-whats-up-with-the-demon/</ref>
[Category:Dunnage characters](/categoryDunnageCharacters/)
{{References}}
